import React, { useState } from 'react' import {FaBars} from 'react-icons/fa' import Sidebar from './Sidebar' function Header() { const [sideBar,setSitebar]=useState(false) const showSidebar=()=>setSitebar(!sideBar) const sideBarStyle=[ {position:"absolute", right:"0px", width:"300px", height:"100%", backgroundColor:"black" }, {maxWidth:"500px", width:"300px", transition:"max-width ease in .5s", backgroundColor:"black", position:"absolute", top:0, right:0 } ] return (

Counter App

) } export default Header
